name: Doge Dash
description:
A Pico-8 Project based on Learning and Implementing. Its my 2nd Pico-8 project including Highscore mechanics and AI as well, made in 2 days with few limitations like:
- One button game
- 3 visible colors (black or white included)
- Game states included ( Menu/Gameover/Restart).
 Feel free to try it out and support me for more of this. Would be much Appreciated .Thanks

Controls/Gameplay

- Press 'Up Arrow' to start the game
- Use 'Up Arrow key' to Dash up and Progress through by avoiding the hurdles from top and bottom. 
- Use 'Up Arrow Key' to Restart the game when Game Over.
- Collect Doge Coins to become Super Doge, AI controlled for 5 secs to help you progress without dying.
